basics.name: Saimanoj Seshagiri
basics.label: GitHub Student Developer | Spark AR Facilitator | Mozilla | GirlScript Vizag | Former Intern at SanRon | Fellow Alphaa AI |
basics.summary: I am Saimanoj Seshagiri, a Graduate student & Ex - Software Developer Intern at SanRon Consultancy Services LLP and beging mentored by Rohit Wanchoo. I'm part of a group that is Spark AR Facilitator for Spack AR Technology. where we focus on the Image Filter's on Facebook and Instagram.

work.company: The School of Innovation from Facebook
highlights: Working as a bridge between university students and Facebook to help them with conceptsin Spark AR and work on real-time challenges that can be solved with the help of technology

Introduced Build an Effect with 2D and 3D object with World effects layer AR experiences on surfaces, objects and people in your environment and are viewable using the world-facing camera on your Smart Phone.
To Support Developer Circles from Facebook and Enthusiastic People in Spark AR Technology
I have worked on a live project of “Designing and Developing an Ed-Tech the software product
I have Mainly Worked on the Front End Development and En-Handling my hands-on skills in Laravel, jQuery, SCSS, JavaScript

education.institution: Sagi Ramakrishnam Raju Engineering College, Bhimavaram, IN
Sir C Ramalinga Reddy Polytechnic, Eluru, IN

highlights: Safer, by bringing blood donors and those in need to a common platform.
Better, by providing every person what he/she deserves the most, best education

references.name: Anna Radulovski
references.reference: Saimanoj is a skilled Front End Developer passionate about community building and open source.At WomenTech Network, he plays an essential role as a Global Ambassador helping to unite 100000 women in tech to drive change with purpose and impact. We are delighted to have such a strong connector and influencer as part of our network, and we are looking forward to further advance our mission together through the WomenTech Global Conference and other initiatives.
